overview: Film-essay about the original villages of the small people of Ludiki. The action takes place in Karelia. The film consists of three parts, each of which is dedicated to one village. Everyday life, myths, fairy tales, people and nature live a special life here, in which everything is important and everything is interconnected. The film contains fragments of a song in the Ludik language, which resembles Kalevala in content.
title: Liudians
